forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this morning. A few showers developing during the afternoon. High around 5C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this morning. A few showers developing during the afternoon. High around 40F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low near 35F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High around 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 42F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. Low 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Low 34F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with a few showers later in the day. High around 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with a few showers later in the day. High near 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 34F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High around 5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. High 41F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 3C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 37F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Temps nearly steady in the upper 30s. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Foggy early, then partly cloudy later at night. Low around -0C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of fog early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low 31F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 6C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 42F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low near 35F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High around 5C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 41F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low near 5C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low near 40F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. High 46F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 39F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High around 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 42F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 33F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. Some snow showers mixing in in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Morning rain followed by a mix of rain and snow showers in the afternoon. High 39F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers will become more widely scattered later on. Low -3C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers early becoming more scattered later. Low 26F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%.
